languages.text: "Едва ли такое слово применимо к арбитру, но доля истины в вашем замечании есть. Раз мы не в бою, я позволяю себе команду "вольно". Однако я по-прежнему бдителен и в полной боевой готовности".

"I doubt such a word could ever be accurately used to describe an Arbitrator, but there is some truth to your observation. Since we're not in combat, I permit myself to stand at ease — which is to say, I am standing by on full alert."
languages.original_text: "Едва ли такое слово применимо к арбитру, но доля истины в вашем замечании есть. Раз мы не в бою, я позволяю себе команду "вольно". Однако я по-прежнему бдителен и в полной боевой готовности".

"I doubt such a word could ever be accurately used to describe an Arbitrator, but there is some truth to your observation. Since we're not in combat, I permit myself to stand at ease — which is to say, I am standing by on full alert."

languages.text: 「その言葉がアービトレイターを正確に表すとは思えませんが、あなたの指摘には一理あります。今は戦闘中ではないので、私は警戒を緩めている―つまり、完全に警戒態勢を維持したまま待機しているということです」
languages.original_text: "I doubt such a word could ever be accurately used to describe an Arbitrator, but there is some truth to your observation. Since we're not in combat, I permit myself to stand at ease — which is to say, I am standing by on full alert."

traits.locale_text: 「その言葉がアービトレイターを正確に表すとは思えませんが、あなたの指摘には一理あります。今は戦闘中ではないので、私は警戒を緩めている―つまり、完全に警戒態勢を維持したまま待機しているということです」

languages.text: "Ich bezweifle, dass dieses Wort jemals wirklich auf einen Arbitrator zutrifft, aber Eure Beobachtung ist nicht ganz falsch. Da wir uns nicht im Kampf befinden, gestatte ich mir, bequem zu stehen – so eine Art volle Alarmbereitschaft im Standby."
languages.original_text: "I doubt such a word could ever be accurately used to describe an Arbitrator, but there is some truth to your observation. Since we're not in combat, I permit myself to stand at ease — which is to say, I am standing by on full alert."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bezweifle, dass dieses Wort jemals wirklich auf einen Arbitrator zutrifft, aber Eure Beobachtung ist nicht ganz falsch. Da wir uns nicht im Kampf befinden, gestatte ich mir, bequem zu stehen – so eine Art volle Alarmbereitschaft im Standby."

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas certain qu'on puisse utiliser ce mot pour qualifier un arbitrator, mais il y a un fond de vérité dans votre observation. Comme nous ne nous trouvons pas en situation de combat, j'ai pris la liberté de me tenir au repos... ce qui signifie que je suis simplement en état de vigilance. »
languages.original_text: "I doubt such a word could ever be accurately used to describe an Arbitrator, but there is some truth to your observation. Since we're not in combat, I permit myself to stand at ease — which is to say, I am standing by on full alert."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas certain qu'on puisse utiliser ce mot pour qualifier un arbitrator, mais il y a un fond de vérité dans votre observation. Comme nous ne nous trouvons pas en situation de combat, j'ai pris la liberté de me tenir au repos... ce qui signifie que je suis simplement en état de vigilance. »

languages.text: «Dudo que esa palabra pueda hacer justicia a lo que entraña ser Arbitrator, pero no le falta razón. Como no estamos en combate, me permito el lujo de no estar en posición de firmes; o lo que es lo mismo, estoy completamente alerta».
languages.original_text: "I doubt such a word could ever be accurately used to describe an Arbitrator, but there is some truth to your observation. Since we're not in combat, I permit myself to stand at ease — which is to say, I am standing by on full alert."

traits.locale_text: «Dudo que esa palabra pueda hacer justicia a lo que entraña ser Arbitrator, pero no le falta razón. Como no estamos en combate, me permito el lujo de no estar en posición de firmes; o lo que es lo mismo, estoy completamente alerta».

languages.text: “‘放松’这个词恐怕永远都不适合用来形容法务官，但你的观察确实有一定道理。既然目前并不需要战斗，我就暂且允许自己安逸地站在这里。换句话说，也就是随时随地都在保持戒备。”
languages.original_text: "I doubt such a word could ever be accurately used to describe an Arbitrator, but there is some truth to your observation. Since we're not in combat, I permit myself to stand at ease — which is to say, I am standing by on full alert."

traits.locale_text: “‘放松’这个词恐怕永远都不适合用来形容法务官，但你的观察确实有一定道理。既然目前并不需要战斗，我就暂且允许自己安逸地站在这里。换句话说，也就是随时随地都在保持戒备。”

languages.text: "Bir Yargıcı'yı layığıyla tanımlamak için böyle bir kelimenin kullanılabileceğinden şüpheliyim ancak gözleminiz isabetsiz değil. Savaşta olmadığımız için kendime rahatta durma izni verdim. Diğer bir deyişle, tam teyakkuzda hazır bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I doubt such a word could ever be accurately used to describe an Arbitrator, but there is some truth to your observation. Since we're not in combat, I permit myself to stand at ease — which is to say, I am standing by on full alert."
